title: The Yakuza (Sidney Pollack, 1974) (DVDRip Dual Eng-Esp)
description:
*******************************************************************************
                                  The Yakuza
*******************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Movie
More Info............: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0073918/
Compression Format...: RAR
Video Format.........: AVI
Video Bitrate........: 1210
Audio Language(s)....: English, Spanish (dubbed in Spain)
Audio Format.........: AC3
Audio Bitrate........: 192 kb/s, 48000 Hz, monophonic CBR
Resolution...........: 704x288
FPS..................: 25.000

Genre................: Action
IMDb Rating..........: 7.2
Movie Information....: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0073918/

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My own rip from this movie, used spanish DVD as source.

Tools used:
- robot4rip
- GKnot
- Avisynth
- VirtualDub
- Nandub
- Nespresso

It's a 2-pass encoding.  I tried to get a 1.4Gb rip, in order to get the best 
possible video quality (cropped the black bars as even it's anamorphic, its 
ratio was 2.44:1 and not the usual 1.85:1 which would have fit your 16:9 
screen), but finally it came closer to 1.3Gb.

Audio tracks are uncompressed, AC3 1.0 from the original source, both in English 
(original language) and Spanish (dubbed in Spain, original dubbing from the 
era).

There are also subtitles enclosed in a subpack, in english, dansk, suomi, 
deutsch, norsk, portuguese, spanish and svenska.  There are burnt subtitles in 
english for some japanese-spoken parts.  I'm sorry, that was already on the 
source.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
